author: heinz.gassner
title: Onboard Manufacturing Industry !
description: 最近まで、産業界のイノベーション担当者は、DLT/ブロックチェーン技術を未熟な誇大広告と分類していました。しかし、この状況は急速に変化しています。

f6_assessments.q0: There is a strong need to carry out meaningful research to analyze the statements like "premature hype". There is also a need to build up use cases based on research in lite of Cardano's superior blockchain technology . The proposal address both the ideas in an established rigorous manner.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is by a team of professionals with impeccable carriers in the relevant areas of work. I feel with these collective credentials the team will be able to complete the proposal in the best possible manner.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget is very reasonable. After review in an open domain, the output might yield good value propositions for businesses to believe in Blockchain technology. The ROI can be implicit, but it will be exponential compared to the fund requested.

f6_assessments.q0: Given the miscellaneous challenge, this fits within the challenge. What's more important in this challenge is the impact on the blockchain and its progression. By providing a thorough risk analysis for the manufacturing industry, this proposal could give a huge boost in empowering the current economy to jump into the blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: DLT-360 is well-known with blockchain technology. They certainly have relevant experience in terms of blockchain as well as in manufacturing.  Being this proposal belongs to a bigger project the proposal is focused on one aspect of the project. The information provided in the proposal is more than sufficient in dealing with the questions we need for feasibility. We have a decent roadmap that explains what the plans are for this part of the bigger project. The cost structure provided in the proposal is certainly reasonable, I would even dare to say the proposers played it safe on budget.
f6_assessments.q2: The overall proposal gives a professional vibe. We have everything we need for auditability in this proposal with overflowing details. Roadmap, milestones, KPI, you name it the proposers have provided it. I strongly agree that we can assess the progress of this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
As an Active Catalyst Member, a consultant myself working with many industrial segments I agree that this proposal effectively aligns with the Cardano Vision and will produce a great impact both on the industry, by generating and presenting research and analysis on how the Blockchain technologies and specially Cardano can provide value to the Industrial Segment now and also to proposers and other groups within Cardano and Catalyst to leverage that information to define and create solutions for the identified pains and areas of opportunity.
The proposal though is missing some key discussion on impact measurement, how success could really be measure and what measurable impact goals could be achieved by it.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team is very knowledgeable and fir for purpose. The timeline provided and milestones are reasonable and the Canvas approach allows to assess that there is good deal of though and analysis on how to reach a good Business Model for this.
The budget is broken down and detailed enough to be understood and I found the rates used aligned with the market. Not so sure about the 5 hs at $200/hr from industry experts (you could find lower rates here) but I don't think that cast any shadows or issues on making this project feasible.
f6_assessments.q2:
The Progress KPIs are there, SMART and detailed, also the Milestones in the timeline will make the tracking and audit of the project while being built very doable and transparent.
I am worried though about the Return on Intention, as it is not clear how much return/impact will be generated to the community. I'd definitely try to come up with some discussion/analysis about that if funded.

solution: チーム内の製造業のコンピタンスを活用して、機会と具体的なハードルを徹底的に分析します。
experience: 30年以上の業界リーダーとしての経験と、特定のドメインエキスパートへの直接アクセス
